channel.title: Genomes on MKLau
channel.description: Recent content in Genomes on MKLau

item.title: Released! Draft *Aphaenogaster* genomes
item.description: Just finished the final assembly of draft genomes for six species of seed ants from the genus Aphaenogaster. You can read the pre-print of the paper here. The sequences will be released on NCBI in May 2018 check them out here.
